name: 9PM
description: A bold, long-lasting fragrance with vanilla, apple, and cinnamon notes, perfect for night outings.

name: Asad
description: Rich and exotic, Assad blends amber, spices, and oud for a powerful and confident scent.

name: Baccarat Rouge 540
description: A luxurious blend of jasmine, saffron, amberwood, and cedar that leaves a strong signature trail.

name: Della
description: Bright and fresh, Della combines citrus zest and light florals for an uplifting everyday fragrance.

name: Genie Club Luxe
description: Elegant and feminine, with notes of rose, jasmine, and a touch of musk for a luxurious finish.

name: Hayatti Lattafa
description: A rich, woody fragrance with incense, agarwood, and hints of spice — strong and memorable.

name: Initio
description: Sensual and intense, Initio blends musk, oud, and spicy accords for a magnetic presence.

name: Kayali
description: Sweet yet fresh, with vanilla, rose, and white florals — perfect for layering or wearing solo.

name: Khamrah
description: Cinnamon-forward with sweet and boozy undertones, Khamrah is perfect for cooler days.

name: Mocha Wood
description: A creamy coffee and wood blend that feels cozy, warm, and smooth — very comforting.

name: Nocturne
description: Dark and mysterious, Nocturne mixes incense, spices, and amber to create a night-inspired allure.

name: Now Women
description: Youthful and vibrant, Now Women sparkles with fruity florals and a soft musky base.

name: OUD for Glory
description: A bold and resinous oud fragrance, strong and long-lasting with an earthy, regal vibe.

name: Ramz Lattafa
description: Smooth and sensual, Ramz blends vanilla, amber, and soft florals for a sweet oriental finish.

name: Supremacy
description: Bright citrus top notes with a strong aromatic and woody dry down — versatile and classy.

name: Tawil
description: A rich blend of cedar, patchouli, and light spices that’s both refined and masculine.

name: TomFord Black Orchid
description: Decadent and dark with black truffle, ylang-ylang, and patchouli — a true statement scent.

name: Valentino
description: Romantic and elegant, Valentino features iris, rose, and vanilla for a luxurious feminine scent.

name: Yara
description: Soft and powdery with tropical notes and creamy florals, Yara is sweet, cozy, and dreamy.

name: Smart
description: A fresh and lively citrus fragrance that’s perfect for everyday confidence and youthful energy. Smart is clean, crisp, and made for the modern vibe.
